remarks: The two subgroups that appear in ~ dpjval add to the full direct product.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dpjfval.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dpjfval.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dpjlem.3 $e |- ( ph -> X e. I ) $.
dpjlsm.s $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) $.
dpjlsm $p |- ( ph -> ( G DProd S ) = ( ( S ` X ) .(+) ( G DProd ( S |` ( I \ { X } ) ) ) ) ) $.
